descriptionHtml:
[i][font=Times New Roman][size=5]Follower Augusty[/size][/font][/i]

Follower Augusty Add to SKYRIM.
BodyType CBBE Custom Weight100.

She has additional magic attack enchant weapons.
Besides, possessing Original weapons,armors,shout and spell.

Use properly Two-handed weapon,one-handed weapon and Destructionspell.

■Additional method.
1.Use Console Command [help Augusty]
2.Use Console Command [player.placeatme XX]
   XX=ID confirmed by help Augusty
3.Please hire her as a follower.

■Installation
Use NMM or Manually introduced.

■Recommended Mods
Face Light
FollowerFunctionExtension MOD

■Credits
Fair Skin Complexion/by HHaleyy
XP32 Maximum Skeleton/by xp32
KS Hairdos - Renewal by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and ShockyEnhanced Character Edit/by ECEteam
Enhanced Character Edit/by ECEteam
ECEE - RANs Enhanced Character Edit Enhancer/by RAN46
Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition& BodySlide/by Caliente Ousnius and Jeir
Phoenix Ebony Armor/by AlanovichRomanov 
Ghosus Weapon Pack/by Ghosu
